## stringAssign() function

字符串赋值

**Signature:**

```typescript
stringAssign: (template: string, data: AnyObject) => string;
```

{<!-- -->string<!-- -->}

## Example

```js
stringAssign('My name is ${user}.', { user: 'zhangsan' });
// => "My name is zhangsan."
```
